caption.title: California precipitation response in atmosphere-only uniform and patterned SST warming simulations.
caption.p: ( a, b) Ensemble mean (left) uniform SST warming (AMIP4K-AMIP) and (right) patterned SST warming (AMIP Future-AMIP) precipitation response (mm day âˆ’1). ( c, d) shows the precipitation response realization agreement (%). Symbols in a, b represent significance at the 90% (diamond), 95% (X) or 99% (+) confidence level, based on a t-test for the difference of means.
